## Packages Needed

library(httr)

### Installing Movie Data
```{r intro, include=TRUE}
myData <- GET("http://www.omdbapi.com/?i=tt3896198&apikey=b1e5e254")
str(myData, max.level = 1)
parsed <- fromJSON(rawToChar(myData$content))
str(parsed, max.level = 1)
```
